thread.title: Rep. Paul Ryan to run for speaker if he's unity candidate of House GOP
thread.title_full: Rep. Paul Ryan to run for speaker if he's unity candidate of House GOP - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Rep. Paul Ryan to run for speaker if he's unity candidate of House GOP
text: WASHINGTON — Rep. Paul Ryan has told House Republicans he will run for House speaker if he is the unity candidate of the divided party. Ryan spoke to the House GOP behind closed doors Tuesday and said if all factions can share his vision and he can get the endorsement of the major caucuses, then he will serve as speaker. In a statement released by the Wisconsin congressman, Ryan said he then “will be all in.” Ryan, 45, under intense pressure to seek the post, gave his colleagues until Friday to express their support. ERICA WERNER, AP Congressional Correspondent
